document.full_text: tour de france contender cadel evans is mystified as to why alberto contador's doping case is taking so long to resolve and is hoping for a final decision sooner rather than later.
document.title: frustrated evans "mystified" by contador delays
lines_and_colors: tour de france contender cadel evans is mystified as to why alberto contador's doping case is taking so long to resolve and is hoping for a final decision sooner rather than later.
